column1: When Jesus spoke again to the people, he said, 'I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will never walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.'

column1: Jesus acts in perfect unity with the Father.

column1: When the Spirit of truth comes, he will guide you into all the truth, for he will not speak on his own authority, but whatever he hears he will speak, and he will declare to you the things that are to come.

column1: Jesus answered, 'I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.'

column1: Jesus knows and guides his followers intimately.

column1: I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
